Class ReaderControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • unidue.ub.statistics.alert.ReaderControl

  • public class ReaderControl
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the information for the digest reader services
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Eike Spielberg

      • buildFromReaderControl

        public ReaderControl buildFromReaderControl(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
                                     throws org.jdom2.JDOMException,
                                            java.io.IOException
        reads the parameters from the http request to modify the corresponding fields of the reader control. If the corresponding readerControl string is given the corresponding file is read from disk.
        Parameters:
        req - the http-request
        Returns:
        ReaderControl the reader control
        Throws:
        org.jdom2.JDOMException - exception while parsing file
        java.io.IOException - exception while reading file from disk

      • readFromDisk

        public ReaderControl readFromDisk(java.lang.String readerControl,
                                  java.lang.String who)
                           throws org.jdom2.JDOMException,
                                  java.io.IOException
        builds the ReaderControl by reading the file associated with the given alertControl from disk.
        Parameters:
        readerControl - the readerControl string
        who - the actual username
        Returns:
        AlertControl alert control
        Throws:
        org.jdom2.JDOMException - exception while parsing file
        java.io.IOException - exception while reading file from disk

      • addToOutput

        public void addToOutput(org.jdom2.Element parent)
        attaches an XML version of the reader controls to the parent xml node
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent xml node
